attributes.action: Make War Pensions Unemployability Supplement the same as Incapacity Benenfit finacial Wise
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why Should Veterens get less money claiming War Pensions Unemployablity Supplement ie some £37 a week, also their wifes would be penalised in the event of the War Veterens Death if not on Unemployability Supplement ie 26 weeks,if they take the financial Loss they would get a War Widows Pension for life, get Veterens off Incapcity and onto the Benefit they earned by defending this country, change the War Pensions articles on this matter without delay, its unjust and unfair
